content:
iPhone 16 from Rs 35,991, MacBook Air M4 from Rs 59,320

Croma Everything Apple Sale: The Indian Express

[Featured Image Prompt] A smartphone and laptop being displayed at the Croma store. A bright light illuminates the display screen of an iPhone 16 and MacBook Air M4.

The Indian Express reports that customers can now benefit from a massive discount across all Apple products, including smartphones and laptops. The sale is set to begin on March 30th, with special offers starting from Rs 35,991 for the iPhone 16. This exclusive offer includes an optional battery replacement as well.

This incredible deal has been made possible due to a favorable exchange rate of the Indian Rupee against the United States Dollar (USD), which is expected to increase in value by about 4-5% this week.

In addition, the company is also offering discounts on some accessories such as cases and charging cables. There are various models available that can be purchased for an affordable price, making them perfect gift ideas or a good investment for one's personal device needs.

The sale is expected to continue till May 31st at the latest with additional deals on select models. It is anticipated that this offer will make it easier for consumers to upgrade their Apple devices and reduce costs significantly over the next few months.

[SEO Title] iPhone 16 from Rs 35,991, MacBook Air M4 from Rs 59,320

[Meta Description] Embark on an exciting shopping spree with the iPhone 16 priced at a stunning Rs 35,991 and the MacBook Air M4 available for only Rs 59,320. Discover exclusive deals on Croma Everything Apple Sale, ensuring every gadget is within your budget.

[Featured Image] A smartphone and laptop being displayed at the Croma store.

What This Means

The iPhone 16 is a versatile device that offers superior performance with a sleek design. The addition of an optional battery replacement means it can last longer on a single charge, making it even more reliable in everyday use.

On the other hand, the MacBook Air M4 features a powerful Intel Core processor and comes equipped with advanced security protocols to protect your sensitive data. This laptop is perfect for professionals who need a lightweight yet highly efficient device that can handle demanding workloads comfortably.

The Croma Everything Apple Sale provides an excellent opportunity for those looking to upgrade their tech needs without breaking the bank, especially considering India's exchange rate fluctuations this week.

Looking Ahead

With many new releases of iPhone and MacBook coming soon from Apple, customers should be prepared to stock up on these devices before they are too hard to find. The sale is expected to run until May 31st, so don't miss out on the chance to save big money!

This Croma Everything Apple Sale offers a perfect opportunity for tech enthusiasts looking to upgrade their phones and laptops or simply enjoy some much-needed savings on one of the most popular devices in the market.

Conclusion

The Indian Express's coverage of this exclusive offer shows how companies are responding to changing economic conditions, making it easier for consumers like you to afford essential technology. This sale is expected to see a surge in sales across various Apple product lines, so don't wait too long!

Stay tuned for more updates on Croma Everything Apple Sale and stay ahead of the market with this incredible offer.

[Content HTML] ```

  1. Croma Everything Apple Sale: iPhone 16 from Rs 35,991, MacBook Air M4 from Rs 59,320  The Indian Express
  2. iPhone 17 selling for less than Rs 45,000 on Croma: 3 reasons to buy and 1 to skip  India Today
  3. Croma Everything Apple Sale: Get iPhone 16 for Rs 35,991, iPhone 17 for Rs 44,768  The Economic Times
  4. iPhone 16 Plus Available at Record Low Price, Biggest Price Drop Yet  The CSR Journal
```
